name: onmarket-test
description: The On Market Testing repository is dedicated to comprehensive end-to-end testing, leveraging the power of Playwright. Developed in TypeScript, it adopts a modular structure with a pages/ directory housing page objects and a well-organized tests/ directory for testing scenarios.

scripts.clean: rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && rimraf test-results && rimraf playwright-report && rimraf junit-results && rimraf lighthouse
scripts.api-ui: npm run clean && npx playwright test tests/api.ui.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.firefox: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.a11y: npm run clean && npx playwright test tests/a11y.lighthouse.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test-head: npm run clean && npx playwright test --headed

author: Tazkiya Mujahid
